caption.js

00001 W.dxul.caption = function(node){
00002     this.tagName = 'caption';
00003     // set Attributes and Properties common to all XUL elements
00004     this.init(node);
00005 
00006     this.core = W.style('legend');
00007     this.core.appendChild(document.createTextNode(node.getAttribute('label')));
00008 
00009     // If a caption element is placed inside the groupbox, it will be used as a
00010     // caption which appears along the top of the groupbox.
00011     if(node.parent.tagName == 'groupbox')
00012         node.parent.core.appendChild(this.core);
00013 };
00014 W.dxul.caption.prototype = new W.dxul.XULElement();
